document_data.name: Vaeril Rhuidhen
document_data.mainbody: '''Vaeril Rhuidhen''' was a [[sun elf]] and a member of the [[Council of Elders (Everlund)|Council of Elders]] in [[Everlund]] as of 1372 DR and also sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Vaeril acted as voice of moderation and reason inside the council. He was also the liaison with the [[Lords' Alliance]].
